description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale and Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025 have begun for their paid subscribers. For others, the sale events will become live at midnight on Tuesday. During the sale events, the two e-commerce platforms will offer various electronics like phones, smartwatches, true wireless stereo (TWS), home appliances, washing machines, refrigerators, PCs, and laptops at discounted prices.
title: Amazon and Flipkart Sale 2025: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra vs iPhone 16 Pro Deals Compared

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is currently live in India with jaw-dropping discounts on thousands of products, including smartphones, laptops, smart TVs, wearables and appliances. Laptops from brands like Dell, Asus, Lenovo and more are currently listed on Amazon with discounted price tags. Further, shoppers can get bank offers, coupon-based discounts and exchange offers.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Top Deals on Laptops Under Rs. 50,000

description: Nothing Ear Open earbuds are available on Flipkart for Rs. 9,999 during the Big Billion Days Sale, down from the launch price of Rs. 17,999. They feature the brand’s signature partially transparent design, open-ear fit with curved bands, and 14.2mm dynamic drivers. The earbuds support ChatGPT integration, Bluetooth 5.3, dual device pairing, and AI-powered Clear Voice for calls, though they lack ANC. Pinch controls and EQ settings are customisable via the Nothing X app, with up to 30 hours of claimed playback with the case.
title: Nothing Ear Open Goes on Sale in India During the Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale: Price, Specifications

description: The Amazon Great Indian Festival 2025 has started for Prime members and opens to all shoppers on Tuesday, offering major discounts, exchange schemes, and added perks across categories. After earlier highlighting laptops, smartphones, tablets, and entertainment devices, we now shift our focus to smartwatches. Top deals from leading brands are available, with SBI debit and credit cardholders getting a 10 percent instant discount. Additional savings can be availed through EMI plans, coupons, and exchange offers, with some prices already reflecting these benefits.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Budget Smartwatches

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2025 is currently live in India for Prime members with huge discounts on smart TVs. Besides the regular discounts, Amazon provides up to 10 percent discount on purchases made using select bank cards during the sale. The sale will be open for all buyers starting September 23.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Smart TVs Under Rs. 50,000

description: Planning a home appliance upgrade this festive season? The Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale is a great avenue to do so. Home appliances, ranging from air conditioners and refrigerators to microwave ovens and washing machines, are available with discounts of up to 65 percent during the sale. Customers can also take advantage of no-cost EMI options and bank offers to further sweeten the deals.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on ACs, Refrigerators and Other Home Appliances

description: Sony has launched its festival season offer, bringing discount on the PlayStation 5. The festive sale starts September 22 and slashes the price of the PS5 by Rs. 5,000. The offer will be live till October 19, or until stocks last, across Amazon, Flipkart, and other retailers.
title: Sony Launches 'Festive Sale', Slashes PS5 Price in India by Rs. 5,000

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2025 is currently live in India for Prime members with huge discounts on smart TVs. Besides the regular discounts, Amazon provides up to 10 percent discount on purchases made using select bank cards during the sale. The sale will be open for all buyers starting September 23.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Smart TVs Under Rs. 50,000

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2025 is live for Prime members and opens to all on Tuesday, offering discounts, exchange deals, and added perks across categories. SBI cardholders can get a 10 percent instant discount, while EMI plans, coupons, and exchange options further lower costs. Previously, we highlighted the best deals on laptops, smartphones, and home entertainment devices. Here we have listed the top offers on tablets. Some listed prices already include these benefits, making it an excellent chance to upgrade or replace your tablet.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Best Discounts and Offers on Tablets

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 has begun for Prime members, and will commence for others on Tuesday (September 23). During the sale event, the company is offering various electronics like phones, smartwatches, true wireless stereo (TWS), home appliances, washing machines, refrigerators, PCs, and laptops at a discounted price. On top of this, smart TVs for reputed brands such as Samsung, LG, Xiaomi, and TCL are available at attractive prices.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Smart TVs Under Rs. 15,000 From Samsung, LG, Xiaomi, TCL and More

description: Motorola has been getting aggressive this sales season and introducing some massive discounts on its products. Ahead of the online sale craze, Gadgets 360 spoke to Motorola's Shivam Ranjan, Global Head of Brand, to discuss the aggressive festive season strategy, pillars of brand differentiation, a human-centric approach to AI, long-term vision, and 2026 trends. Shivam talked about select hero products on sale this season, offering massive discounts.
title: Motorola's Festive Playbook: "True Value" Over Gimmicks to Win Indian Buyers

description: Samsung has reportedly started pushing the stable One UI 8 update to last year’s Galaxy S24 FE. According to a report, the rollout began with beta testers in South Korea and includes the latest security patch. The Android 16-based skin introduces redesigned apps, improved functionality, and Live Updates for tracking activities and sporting events. The Now Brief feature is also said to be available with this update.
title: Samsung Galaxy S24 FE Reportedly Receives Stable One UI 8 Update: How to Download and Install

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival 2025 kicked off for Prime members on September 22, offering wide-ranging discounts on tech and home products. Shoppers can find deals across smartphones, laptops, smart TVs, gaming consoles, and more. Notably, those eyeing a gaming laptop can save up to Rs. 50,000 on models from Asus, MSI, and Acer during the sale.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Gaming Laptops Available With Up to Rs. 50,000 Discount

description: One UI 8 has been rolled out for the Galaxy S24 series in South Korea, as per a tipster. Meanwhile, Samsung has also confirmed its release for its sixth-generation foldables --- the Galaxy Z Fold 6 and the Galaxy Z Flip 6 --- in the same market. The update, which is based on Android 16, also brings the latest security patch for September 2025.
title: Samsung Galaxy S24, Galaxy Z Fold 6, and Z Flip 6 Start Receiving One UI 8 Update in South Korea

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2025 began on Monday for Prime members in India, offering attractive discounts, exchange deals, and additional perks. Best deals include electronics like laptops, smart TVs, gaming gear, and smartphones. SBI debit and credit card users can get a 10 percent instant discount, with EMI, coupon, and exchange offers further lowering prices. Here we have now highlighted the top deals on Vivo and iQOO smartphones. These deals will be available to all customers on September 23.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Top Discounts on Vivo and iQOO Smartphones

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival sale 2025 brings some great discounts on gaming laptops under Rs. 1 lakh. Customers can get up to 45 percent off on the latest gaming laptops from popular brands like Asus, Dell, HP, Lenovo, MSI, and more, during the Amazon sale 2025. In this article, we will tell you the best deals available on gaming laptops under Rs. 1 lakh.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Gaming Laptop Deals Under Rs. 1 Lakh from Asus, HP, Lenovo, and More

description: The Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale is now live for Prime members. If a new laptop is what’s on your shopping list this festive season, then the Amazon Great Indian Festival sale offers discounts of up to 45 percent on new launches from top brands like Acer, Dell, HP, and more. Customers can also unlock extra savings with SBI Debit and Credit Card discounts.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Up to 45 Percent on Newly Launched Laptops from Asus, HP, and More Brands

description: iQOO 15 rumours have been surfacing online for a while. Now, the company has revealed the rear design of the upcoming flagship smartphone via a Weibo post. Moreover, some specifications and features of the phone have been leaked online. This comes after the Chinese smartphone maker recently made the phone available for pre-orders in China. The handset will launch in October. However, the company has yet to reveal its exact launch date.
title: iQOO 15 Design, New Colourways Revealed Ahead of October Launch

description: Lenovo is cancelling some pre-orders of the Lenovo Legion Go 2 handheld, citing intense demand for the device. The company said it was cancelling some pre-orders placed on its website, but confirmed more units of the Legion Go 2 were on their way to retailers globally.
title: Lenovo Cancels Some Pre-Orders of Lenovo Legion Go 2, Says Demand 'Substantially Exceeded' Projections

description: Oppo Find X9 series China launch date announced. The Oppo Find X8 successors are confirmed to come with up to 7,500mAh battery,  ColorOS 16 and the new MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chipset. The lineup will be launched in global markets outside China soon. The series will feature Oppo's self-developed Trinity Engine and Hasselblad-tuned rear camera setup.
title: Oppo Find X9 Launch Date Announced, Global Debut Teased; Will Feature Dimensity 9500 Chipset, Up to 7,500mAh Battery

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 will open for all shoppers on September 23. The discount sale brings discounts on a range of smartphones. Different models, including OnePlus Nord CE 4, iQOO Z10R 5G, and Redmi 15 5G, are currently listed with discounts. Here we've listed some of the interesting deals on the best smartphones under Rs. 20,000.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Smartphones Under Rs 20,000

description: Xiaomi 15 Ultra, Xiaomi 15S Pro, and Redmi K80 Pro will be among the first smartphones to get the Chinese smartphone maker’s Android 16-based HyperOS 3 update. The company will start rolling out the latest software version on October 15. By the end of October, other devices such as Xiaomi smartwatches, foldable phones, tablets, and smart TVs will also start receiving the HyperOS 3 update.
title: HyperOS 3 Update Release Timeline Revealed; Xiaomi 15 Ultra, Redmi K80 Pro Among First Phones to Get Updates

description: MediaTek Dimensity 9500 SoC has been launched, featuring a third-generation design with only performance cores, and it delivers up to 29 percent better single-core and 16% better multi-core performance than its predecessor. Flagship smartphones like the Oppo Find X9 series and Vivo X300 lineup will be launched with the MediaTek Dimensity 9500 SoC in Q4 2025.
title: MediaTek Dimensity 9500 Launched; Will Debut on Oppo Find X9 Series, Vivo X300 Lineup

description: OpenAI and LoveFrom are said to be co-developing an AI-powered smart speaker, though this is only one of several devices planned. The collaboration stems from OpenAI CEO Sam Altman and ex-Apple design chief Jony Ive. Alongside the speaker, the duo is reportedly exploring smart glasses, an AI digital recorder, and even an AI Pin, which Ive is less enthusiastic about.
title: OpenAI, Jony Ive Reportedly Developing AI Speakers and Smart Glasses on the Back of Apple’s Supply Chain

description: Perplexity CEO Aravind Srinivas confirmed that the artificial intelligence (AI)-powered Comet browser is launching in India on September 22. Currently, the app is open for pre-register on Android in the country, while its desktop version has already launched for macOS and Windows. Currently, the iOS version of the app is not available in the country.
title: Perplexity’s Comet Browser Launched in India on Desktop, Available for Pre-Register on Android

description: The Galaxy S26 Ultra is expected to debut a “Private Display” feature, allowing users to protect sensitive content in public. It can reportedly be manually enabled for select apps, like banking, or scheduled automatically, with options for “Manual” or “Maximum Privacy,” which dims the screen for improved protection. The phone may also feature Flex Magic Pixel OLED technology, which adjusts viewing angles to prevent others from seeing the screen and, combined with AI, enhances privacy without reducing display quality.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Could Offer 'Private Display' Feature Spotted in One UI 8.5 Code

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival and Flipkart’s Big Billion Days Sale have now commenced for their respective subscribers in India. Several iPhone models are currently listed at considerably lower rates than their usual market prices. Shoppers can purchase iPhone 14, iPhone 15, iPhone 16 Pro, and iPhone 16 Pro Max with discounts, bank offers, and more.
title: Amazon and Flipkart Sale: Deals on iPhone 16 Pro, iPhone 15, and iPhone 14 Now Live

description: Microsoft has announced a price hike for its Xbox consoles, the second of the year. Xbox Series S/X will cost more in the US starting October 3. The Series S is going up in price by $20, while the Series X will see a $50 increase. Microsoft said the price rise was due to " changes in the macroeconomic environment."
title: Microsoft Raises Prices of Xbox Series S/X Consoles in the US Again

description: Xiaomi 17 series will comprise the standard Xiaomi 17, Xiaomi 17 Pro, and Xiaomi 17 Pro Max. The launch for the handsets has been scheduled for September 25 by the company. Now, the smartphone maker has confirmed some specifications of the standard Xiaomi 17 model. One of the company executives has already revealed that the phone will offer a significant upgrade over its predecessor, the Xiaomi 15.
title: Xiaomi 17 Design, Specifications Revealed Ahead of Launch on September 25

description: This year, the Galaxy ecosystem brings together the very best of design, performance, and innovation, all available at special festive prices on Flipkart and Amazon.
title: Best Samsung Deals You Shouldn’t Miss This Festive Season

description: iPhone Air teardown video has been released by gadget-repair site iFixit, offering a glimpse of its internals and rating its repairability. The new model, which was launched as Apple's thinnest iPhone ever with a 5.6mm slim build, has easily swappable batteries and a modular USB Type-C port. At the end, the teardown video gives the iPhone Air repairability score of seven out of 10.
title: iPhone Air Teardown Video Reveals Easily Swappable Batteries; iFixit Repairability Score Matches iPhone 16 Pro

description: Realme GT 8 series will launch soon, a company executive recently confirmed. Now, the company has announced that the upcoming Realme lineup will debut in China in October. However, the Chinese smartphone maker has not revealed the exact launch date yet. Moreover, the pre-orders for the Realme GT 8 series are now open in the country. The tech firm said that customers who pre-book a handset would be eligible to redeem additional benefits at the time of purchase.
title: Realme GT 8 Series Launch Timeline Confirmed, Pre-Orders Begin in China Ahead of Debut

description: The Vivo X300 series will be launched in China on October 13, as per the company. The upcoming lineup will include the standard X300 and X300 Pro models, both sporting a circular camera island at the back. The Vivo X300 is confirmed to arrive in four shades, including Free Blue, Comfortable Purple, Pure Black. We can expect more details to surface closer to the launch of the Vivo X300 series, which is scheduled for October 13.
title: Vivo X300 Series Launch Date Set for October 13; Vivo X300 Colourways Revealed Ahead of Debut

description: Xiaomi 17 series will be launched in China this month, featuring the Xiaomi 17, 17 Pro, and 17 Pro Max. The company has announced the Xiaomi 17 series launch date and the lineup will be powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC. Xiaomi replaces the Ultra branding with Pro Max, possibly to compete more directly with Apple. All models have Leica-backed cameras, while the Pro models add a “Magic Back Screen.” Despite upgrades, pricing is expected to match predecessors.
title: Xiaomi 17, Xiaomi 17 Pro, Xiaomi 17 Pro Max Launch Date Announced, Design Teased

description: Amazon Great India Festival Sale 2025 Live Updates: Amazon's sale event, now live for Prime members, offers major discounts on smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more, and you can stay tuned to this live blog for the latest updates. Buyers can save further via exchange offers and bank card deals, including 10 percent off with SBI cards and 5 percent cashback via Amazon Pay ICICI cards. Popular devices like the iPad Air (M3), Galaxy Tab S9 FE, and Dell, HP, and Asus laptops are available at reduced prices.
title: Amazon Sale 2025 LIVE: Top Deals on Flagship Smartphones, Laptops, Smart TVs and More

description: The sub-Rs. 30,000 smartphone segment offers an extra set of features over the low-end midrange models sold in India. In some cases it is a telephoto camera, while other brands go for a large battery with fast charging. There are also brands that offer quad-curved displays with skinny borders, while some brands go with better durability.
title: Best Smartphones Under Rs 30,000 in India: From OnePlus Nord CE 5, Nothing Phone 3a Pro and more

description: OnePlus 15 is expected to go official soon as the successor to the OnePlus 13. Ahead of its anticipated debut, a real-life unit of the handset was allegedly seen during an event, which showcases the rumoured design changes that are likely to arrive this year. It is seen in a white colourway, sporting a rectangular-shaped camera island aligned to the top-left corner of the screen. It appears similar to what we’ve seen on the OnePlus 13s and is a big change from the circular deco of its predecessor.
title: OnePlus 15 Design Allegedly Revealed via Real-Life Image at Elite Gaming League Finals in China

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival sale 2025 brings some great discounts on Redmi and Xiaomi mobiles. Customers can get up to 50 percent off on the latest Xiaomi and Redmi smartphones during the Amazon sale 2025. In this article, we will tell you the best deals available on OnePlus smartphones.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Redmi and Xiaomi Smartphones
